Question: Shanghai Evoiot Intelligent technology co., ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shanghai Evoiot Intelligent technology co., ltd

Product: Multi-Purpose Intelligent Yard Robot

- A family of products designed to take care of various backyard tasks, including a snow blower, lawn mower, granular spreader, liquid spreader, and more
- All products work with the same power docking station for a seamless experience
- Newer models available for pre-order
